metadata.description: It's back, the comic book adaptation of one of the most famous and popular sci-fi television series of the 1960s - Irwin Allen's Voyage to the Bottom of Sea! This series reprints of the entire series of Gold Key comic books featuring Admiral Nelson, Captain Crane, and the crew of the Seaview. Included is documentary material about the series, its designs, and special effects. Each issue is digitally remastered to look better than when these books first hit the stands.
metadata.name: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea: The Complete Series
